snippet: An Iowa company is dropping plans to slaughter horses after a federal judge temporarily banned the practice as part of a lawsuit filed by animal welfare groups.
abstract: Iowa company Responsible Transportation is dropping plans to slaughter horses after federal judge temporarily bans practice as part of lawsuit filed by animal welfare groups; business owns slaughterhouse and was one of two companies that had secured federal permits for horse slaughtering.
lead_paragraph: An Iowa company is dropping plans to slaughter horses after a federal judge temporarily banned the practice as part of a lawsuit filed by animal welfare groups.

keywords.value: Humane Society of the United States
keywords.name: organizations
